function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Balanced government intervention, transparent policy implementation, and safeguarding privacy rights through regulations and oversight.","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Facilitate dialogue and collaboration between western and eastern eu member states to address concerns and find common ground","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encourage and support national governments to uphold and strengthen their commitments to climate action","category":"Encourage and support the adoption of low or zero carbon energy sources and emission reduction regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Establishment of coordinated global energy governance and inclusive policies that prioritize decarbonization","category":"Encourage and support the adoption of low or zero carbon energy sources and emission reduction regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encouraging and incentivizing countries to pursue green stimulus and sustainable energy transitions through international cooperation and funding mechanisms","category":"Invest in sustainable energy infrastructure, promote green technology adoption, and enforce emissions regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Balancing re-shoring efforts with global cooperation, technology transfer, and efficiency improvements in localized energy production","category":"Diversification into clean energy sources, government support for producers","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporate green stimulus and sustainable investments into recovery packages","category":"Invest in sustainable energy infrastructure, promote green technology adoption, and enforce emissions regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shift investments towards sustainable energy and cleantech","category":"Invest in sustainable energy infrastructure, promote green technology adoption, and enforce emissions regulations","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increase support and investment in cleantech and green energy sectors","category":"Increase support and investment in cleantech and green energy sectors","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strategic allocation of funding for public health infrastructure, research and development of vaccines and treatments, and establishment of effective pandemic response protocols","category":"Strategic allocation of funding for public health infrastructure, research and
